item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

Mezcal is a great Mexican restaurant in New Haven offering authentic Mexican food as well as fantastic margaritas and Mexican beers. We had very fun happy hours there before, and it seems like the perfect time to go back.

The owner of Mezcal, Ricardo, is offering these happy hour specials:
** ALL BEER $2.50
** $4.00 Regular & Flavored Margaritas
** $5.50 Traditional Margaritas

The restaurant is open until 9:30 on Monday nights.

Contact is Andrea 203-641-8083

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: We are usually pretty easy to find...otherwise call the contact's cell phone or ask a server/bartender at Mezcal.
item.name: Monday Happy Hour 5/10 @ Mezcal
